resources.string: K-Server

A open-source sync server for Octi made by this app\'s developer. Data is encrypted client-side, only your devices can decrypt it.\n\nAs both the app and the server are still being improved, it may be less stable than other sync options.
Inactive accounts are deleted after a few weeks.
Add new Google Drive
You will need access to another device that is already linked.
About KServer
KServer is an open-source sync server (in Kotlin) for Octi by darken.
Author
Source code
Clear device\'s data on this account. Devices stay linked but their stored data is removed.
This will remove this device from your account. If this is the last linked device, your account will be deleted.
Link new device
Link code
Create a text code that you can send through other apps
Show a QRCode
Link device via NFC
A new device was linked to your account.
Looking for NFC client. Hold this device close to the device you want link to your account.
Manually copy and paste a link code
Scan a QR code from another device
Use two devices with NFC
Start camera
Link device
Looking for NFC host. Hold it close to the device offering to share account access.
